item.title: Finding the Dream Team in FIFA 20 using Linear Programming
item.description: In my childhood me and my friends used to guess what would be the soccer Dream Team of the season. We hadn’t any metrics to compare our choices, so the results were doubtful. Recently, I found this dataset about FIFA on Kaggle. The data contains the scores of 18.279 players in all of the 27 soccer positions (goalkeeper, centre forward, etc). Motivated by my childhood I used this data and Linear Programming (LP) to find the set of players which sum maximizes the overall team score, in other words, the Dream Team.
